name: Dinner Tonight: Carrots With Caraway Seeds
description: I was searching for one last Thanksgiving trick. I flipped through my copy of the Silver Palate, hoping to find some deah simple preparation for carrots, one that would fit nicely on an already overflowing table. I’d already made glazed...
recipeIngredient: 4 carrots, peeled, and cut into 1-inch lengths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the carrots in a sauce pan, cover with water, and turn the heat to medium. Let them cook until tender, about 25 minutes.
Meanwhile, melt the butter over low heat in another sauce pan. When the butter has melted, add the brown sugar, ginger, and caraway seeds. Mix together and then turn off the heat.
Drain the carrots when done, and toss into the pan with the butter mixture. Turn the heat to low, and let cook for about 5 minutes. Serve up!
